questions.question: Do you offer internships for students?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide internship opportunities for students in multiple technical domains.

questions.question: What are the eligibility criteria for internships?
questions.answer: Internships are open to graduates and current students in engineering, computer science, and related streams.

questions.question: How do I apply for an internship?
questions.answer: You can apply through our website or contact our HR team for the latest openings.

questions.question: Do you provide certifications after internships?
questions.answer: Yes, interns receive certificates on successful completion of the program.

questions.question: Is there any stipend offered during the internship?
questions.answer: Stipends depend on project, duration, and location; please check individual listings.

questions.question: Do you provide industrial training for students and professionals?
questions.answer: Yes, our industrial training programs are tailored for both students and working professionals.

questions.question: Are trainings offered online or offline?
questions.answer: We provide both online and classroom training modes.

questions.question: Which topics are covered in training?
questions.answer: Topics range from web development, app development, AI/ML, data analytics, DevOps, and more.

questions.question: Are your training programs project-based?
questions.answer: Yes, most training involves hands-on projects and assignments to boost learning.

questions.question: Do you provide placement assistance after training?
questions.answer: Yes, we share profiles with hiring partners and help with resume building and interview preparation.

questions.question: Is hands-on training provided on analytics tools?
questions.answer: Students learn Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio, and other tools.

questions.question: Is there a web development internship available?
questions.answer: Yes, web development internships include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, and project work.

questions.question: Do you provide web development training?
questions.answer: Our web development training covers front-end, back-end, full stack, and deployment.

questions.question: Can I learn SEO in web development training?
questions.answer: SEO principles are included in web development and digital strategy training.

questions.question: Do you create corporate websites?
questions.answer: Yes, we develop modern, responsive corporate websites.

questions.question: Can you build a responsive website?
questions.answer: Yes, all our websites are responsive and mobile-friendly.

questions.question: Do you make SEO-friendly websites?
questions.answer: Yes, we follow SEO best practices in website development.

questions.question: What technologies do you use in web development?
questions.answer: We use technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Angular, PHP, Python, and more.

questions.question: Do you develop single-page applications?
questions.answer: Yes, we create single-page applications using frameworks like React and Angular.

questions.question: Can you integrate payment gateways into websites?
questions.answer: Yes, we can integrate secure payment gateways.

questions.question: How long does website development take?
questions.answer: It depends on project size, but usually takes 2–8 weeks.

questions.question: Are there internships for Android app development?
questions.answer: Yes, Android development internships cover Java, Kotlin, UI design, and app deployment.

questions.question: Is there training on Android app development?
questions.answer: We provide Android training including hands-on mobile projects.

questions.question: Which IDE is used for Android training?
questions.answer: Android Studio is our primary development platform.

questions.question: Can you create Android apps?
questions.answer: Yes, we develop Android applications.

questions.question: Do you develop iOS apps?
questions.answer: Yes, we also develop iOS apps.

questions.question: Do you develop hybrid mobile apps?
questions.answer: Yes, we create hybrid apps using Flutter and React Native.

questions.question: Can you build apps for startups?
questions.answer: Yes, we support startups with cost-effective app solutions.

questions.question: Do you develop on Flutter or React Native?
questions.answer: Yes, we use Flutter and React Native for app development.

questions.question: How long does it take to build an app?
questions.answer: It usually takes 1–3 months, depending on complexity.

questions.question: Is there an AI/ML internship available?
questions.answer: Yes, AI/ML internships cover Python, machine learning, data science, and neural networks.

questions.question: Do you train in AI/ML?
questions.answer: We provide specialized training in AI, ML, deep learning, NLP, and computer vision.

questions.question: What Python libraries are used in AI training?
questions.answer: Training covers TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Pandas, Numpy, and Matplotlib.

questions.question: Are internships offered in data analytics?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer data analytics internships working with real business datasets.

questions.question: Is training available for data analytics?
questions.answer: Data analytics training includes Excel, SQL, Python, R, dashboarding, and visualizations.

questions.question: Do you provide data analytics solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we analyze and visualize data with advanced tools.

questions.question: Can you build machine learning models?
questions.answer: Yes, we can build ML models for your use case.

questions.question: Do you work with predictive analytics?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in predictive analytics.

questions.question: Can you provide AI chatbots?
questions.answer: Yes, we develop AI-powered chatbots.

questions.question: Do you do natural language processing (NLP)?
questions.answer: Yes, we implement NLP solutions.

questions.question: Do you have DevOps internships?
questions.answer: Yes, DevOps internships involve cloud platforms, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring tools.

questions.question: Is there DevOps training for beginners?
questions.answer: Our DevOps training covers workflows, pipelines, automation, version control, and cloud platforms.

questions.question: Do you provide AWS/Azure/GCP training?
questions.answer: Yes, cloud training is included in DevOps, covering AWS, Azure, and GCP.

questions.question: What is DevOps?
questions.answer: DevOps is an approach combining development and operations for faster software delivery.

questions.question: Can you manage cloud deployment?
questions.answer: Yes, we handle cloud deployment.

questions.question: Do you offer cloud migration services?
questions.answer: Yes, we migrate applications securely to the cloud.

questions.question: Do you work with AWS?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide AWS solutions.

questions.question: Do you work with Azure?
questions.answer: Yes, we support Azure.

questions.question: Do you provide GCP solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with Google Cloud Platform.

questions.question: Do you offer software development internships?
questions.answer: We offer internships in software engineering for C++, Python, Java, .NET, and more.

questions.question: Is there software development training?
questions.answer: Yes, we conduct training on system design, architecture, programming, and software lifecycle.

questions.question: Can I do an internship focused on a specific programming language?
questions.answer: Yes, internships are available for Python, Java, C++, and JavaScript depending on project needs.

questions.question: Do you offer language-specific training programs?
questions.answer: We have beginner-to-advanced courses for Python, Java, C++, JavaScript, PHP, and more.

questions.question: Can I get certified in programming languages?
questions.answer: Yes, official certificates are provided after training completion.

questions.question: Where is your company located?
questions.answer: We are based in India, with offices in Jamshedpur, Bhopal, Bangalore, and Kolkata.

questions.question: Do you have offices in multiple cities?
questions.answer: Yes, we operate from multiple cities including Jamshedpur, Bhopal, Bangalore, and Kolkata.

questions.question: Which cities do you have offices in?
questions.answer: We have offices in Jamshedpur, Bhopal, Bangalore, and Kolkata.

questions.question: Is your company based in India?
questions.answer: Yes, our company is based in India.

questions.question: How long has your company been in business?
questions.answer: We have been serving clients for several years with innovative software solutions.

questions.question: What industries do you serve?
questions.answer: We serve industries like education, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, finance, and more.

questions.question: What services does your company provide?
questions.answer: We provide web development, mobile app development, custom software, AI/ML, DevOps, and analytics services.

questions.question: Do you provide complete digital transformation services?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide complete end-to-end digital transformation solutions.

questions.question: Can you develop custom software for businesses?
questions.answer: Yes, we specialize in developing customized software for any business requirement.

questions.question: Do you offer AI and machine learning solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide AI/ML-based solutions such as predictive analytics, chatbots, and more.

questions.question: Do you handle DevOps and cloud integrations?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer full DevOps services including automation and cloud integration.

questions.answer: Yes, we can develop scalable and secure e-commerce platforms.

questions.question: Do you design websites?
questions.answer: Yes, we design and develop professional websites.

questions.question: Can you make mobile applications?
questions.answer: Yes, we develop both Android and iOS mobile apps.

questions.question: Do you provide HRMS software?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide HRMS software.

questions.question: Do you provide DMS (document management system)?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide DMS solutions.

questions.question: Do you provide LMS (learning management system)?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer LMS platforms.

questions.question: Do you provide inventory management software?

questions.question: Do you provide e-commerce solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide end-to-end e-commerce development.

questions.question: Can you build custom ERP systems?
questions.answer: Yes, we design and build ERP software.

questions.question: How do I start a project with you?
questions.answer: You can contact us, and we'll schedule a consultation.

questions.question: What is the process of software development?
questions.answer: We follow requirement gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment steps.

questions.question: Do you sign NDA and contracts?
questions.answer: Yes, we ensure data confidentiality with NDAs.

questions.question: Do you provide free consultation?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer free initial consultation.

questions.question: Do you charge hourly or fixed price?
questions.answer: We provide both hourly and fixed-price models.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance.

questions.question: Do you maintain the software after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide maintenance.

questions.question: Do you provide 24/7 support?
questions.answer: Yes, 24/7 support is available.

questions.question: Can you handle bug fixes?

questions.question: Do you have AMC (annual maintenance contract)?
